short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bliko turns student-teacher conversations and raw notes into engaging learning content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your teaching process with Bliko! Transform your raw class notes into enriched, structured content, ready to share with your students effortlessly.

How it works:
During your lessons, Bliko’s floating menu lets you record both your voice and your student’s. After the session, the recording is automatically uploaded to your account, where Bliko enhances your notes with clear formatting, additional context, and actionable insights—helping you save time while delivering top-notch learning materials.
